ActFirst Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act
PrecisReappointment of LESTER DAVID LAFOND of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, to be a commissioner of the First Nations Tax Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending April 29, 2011, effective April 30, 2008.
